import React from 'react' import Styled from 'styled-components' import Date_picker from 'react-datepicker' import { Use_Global_Context } from '../../context/globalContext' function form(){ const {add_income}=Use_Global_Context(); const [inputState, setInputState] = React.useState({ title: '', amount:'', date: '', category: '', descritption:'', }) const handleInput = name => e => { setInputState({...inputState,[name]:e.target.value}) } const handleSubmit = e =>{ e.preventDefault() add_income(inputState) } return (
{ setInputState({...inputState,date: date}) }} />
) } const form_styled = Styled.div` `; export default form;
